snippet: Don’t bank on an elite graduate school to raise your undergraduate profile, or earnings, according to a new study.
abstract: Experts point out that it is very difficult for students from less competitive colleges to gain admission to top graduate schools, undermining common advice that master's degree is more important to career ambitions than undergraduate education.
lead_paragraph: Don’t bank on an elite graduate school to raise your undergraduate profile, or earnings, according to a new study.
